channel.title: Tribal Isles
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://img828.imageshack.us/img828/9974/45203725.png[/img][/center]
Before I begin this server is based on two tribes. Natoo being the more jungle based tribe whereas Matee being more desert, this is evident in there flags & logos.
[left][img]http://imgur.com/Oi4Nd.png[/img][/left][right][img]http://imgur.com/xna1Y.png[/img][/right]
Hello, I come today to show you a development I have been hoping to commit myself too for a few months, I've finally digged up enough spare time to actually get something done and hope other members of the community can join me in developing this server. The story;
Myself, Scape-JAVA (Adam) and Si force (Marc) originally had the idea of creating a runescape server based on two tribes in a outgoing conflict with one another. We decided it would be based around two islands, two tribes. When you logged in you would be given a tribe, or get to choose a tribe (We weren't too sure there due to unfair numbers and evening it out). I sincerely hope Marc can join me as he once did last year or so on continuing this epic development.
I'm now going to discuss specific ideas which I plan on implementing into this server, this will be very different from what you're usually used too.
Ideas;
[ul][li]Jobs - Jobs depending on which tribe you came from, Marc came up with some tribe names but I can't seem to remember them. This will add a cutting edge to the server and hopefully attract more traffic.[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Tasks & Task force - An idea we didn't really visit, but I want to visit it now. The task force will have the job off hitting against the opposite tribe, this can add the pvp element in a way. This also ties in with my other idea off if let's say a person from A tribe goes into B territory, B people can attack A. And then obviously this works the other way around.[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Territories - Yep, two islands far apart from one another. They fight for control over the mainland, cities such as Varrock, Falador etc. The more the people control, the better well off the are due to the control more area thus more resources. I plan on looking at the map to spread it out accordingly to affect the game in a positive way.[/li][/ul]
These are just a few ideas we've visited. I look and hope to visit more, I'm not going to lie this won't be an easy development but I'm sure with a high amount of teamwork and contributions from [b]everyone[/b] that we can get through this and make it a success. We will not tolerate slackers in this development, don't work, don't do it.
I'm now going to go through the current team, as I stated before I'm not sure if Marc is going to rejoin this development. I'm also not sure if others will be interested who where once in it. The current team consists off;
[center]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=284102]TOMSCAPE BETA (Me, call me Tom) - Project Manager[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=458166]xx matty xx (Matt) - Site Admin/Web developer[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=117587]Si force (Marc) - Project Manager[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=374318]Scape-JAVA (Adam) - Developer/Project Manager[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=459742]I vain I (Anthony) - Server developer[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=235977]Primadude (Jamie) - Developer[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=324294]Davidi2 (David) - Developer[/url]
[/center]
I'm looking for a maximum off 5 developers, this may change depending on the world load in which I assign, and have to do myself. You will automatically achieve developer status on this project if you can prove your skills to me and Matthew (also, possibly the other developers). I want to make this a very friendly work force and will do votes on specific decisions.
I'll be updating this thread when I have more too say, with pictures/videos etc..The developers will be having a vote over what base etc we'll be using.
Thanks for reading, and good luck. [b]I'd also like to thank Tonypker13 for the logo.[/b]
[center][b]Meeting Timetable[/b][/center]
[i]Matt suggested we have a meeting time table + a topic for each meeting, so I'm going too post them here along with the topic, on some occasions there might not be a topic. It's all for the sake of keeping on top of the work load and improving organizational skills. (Crossed out means it's been had)
[/i]
[ul][li][i][s]Meeting one - Topic: General overview, introduction and recruitment meeting.[/s][/i][/li][li][i]Meeting two - Topic:Development and ideas brainstorm Date: Today[/i][/li][/ul]
[ul][li] I hope to work towards fitting all features into the game concept in this meeting, then we can begin development.[/li] [li] [s]Our second objective is too discuss graphical issues we may encounter and possible ways we can put our ideas into actions - This will be one of our last non-programming meetings.[/s] - DONE[/li][/ul]
[i]Updated:(Friday, October 29th) Please note: All developers have now been assigned with a role in this project, and have been given a designated area where we will hold our meetings. While I'm writing this I feel it necessary to give update to what we've discussed in relation to the development. We plan to develop a web-integration along side this to enhance Tribal Isles even more, thus adding more to our priority list. Once the poll is over we'll begin on the server-side off the project, as off now we're solely working on the web-side off it.[/i]
[i]Updated:(Friday, October 29th) Flags, symbols done + started developing ingame features. [/i]
[i]Updated: (Sunday, November 14, 2010) We have decided the homes of our 2 tribes, we plan on having the Natoo in ape toll, and the Matee in Nardah (some place in the desert). We have also decided on a base, iClarity by Primadude.

item.description:
@Tom wrote:

It would be great if we could just get 20 minutes every few days where we are all on at the same time. I propose between 8PM and 11PM, GMT. Please check this for your timezone, and tell me if it’s convenient or not. Then we can discuss specific meeting times.

ps, if you’re not active and you don’t tell anyone why, you’ll just be removed from the team.
